about.abouttext2: AMAZING HOMES, PLAYFUL PARKS, AND A COMMUNITY TO CALL HOME. Located in northeast Colorado Springs, Wolf Ranch sits at about 6,500 feet in elevation. Higher than Colorado Springs, its residents never tire of spectacular views of the Rocky Mountain Front Range and the city. Wolf Ranch has parks, open space, trails, a recreation center and a dog park. Plans include more than 300 acres of open space and parks, over 10 miles of trail, additional recreation centers and a 14-acre lake at the town center. Gateway Park is a glimpse of what is to come, with a waterfall, pond, fountain, entertainment pavilion and grassy knoll that is situated near the entrance to Wolf Ranch. This park serves as a place to reflect and gather while taking advantage of the striking views of Pikes Peak. The Wolf Ranch Community Council weaves a strong social fabric amongst its residents through planned concerts, events and activities. When community life is strong, it benefits everyone by making each member more aware of one another. Located within the boundaries of the award-winning Academy District 20 Schools, Wolf Ranch is home to Ranch Creek Elementary School and other school sites are planned for the future.The region’s leading new home builders are waiting to help you discover the beauty, quality and affordability of life at Wolf Ranch. From move-up options to estate living, you’ll find the house that says “home” to you in the neighborhoods of Wolf Ranch.
